short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yu Yu Hakusho Wallpaper turn new tab to custom YuYu Hakusho background. Yu Yu Hakusho wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Yu Yu Hakusho wallpapers every time you open a new tab.  
2. Randomize Yu Yu Hakusho backgrounds or mark favorites through the wallpaper selection panel.  
3. Integrated Google-powered search bar.  
4. Quick access to emails and social media platforms.  
5. Automatically display the current date and time.  
6. Create new notes to jot down tasks conveniently.  
7. Easy navigation to your most visited websites.  
8. Seamless access to your bookmarks.  
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.  
10. Quick access to Google apps.  
11. Explore and switch to more themes effortlessly.  
12. Share content instantly on social media.  
13. Download wallpapers with a single click.  
14. Access games directly from the new tab.  
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in the Yu Yu Hakusho themed new tab.
